meanings.definition: A type of sedimentary rock formed from compacted silt.
meanings.sent1: The geologist studied the siltstones closely.
meanings.sent2: The riverbed was filled with layers of siltstones.
meanings.sent3: The siltstones in the quarry told stories of ancient rivers.
meanings.sent4: The siltstones stood like silent witnesses to the passing of time.
meanings.sent5: The siltstones shimmered in the sunlight, revealing their history.

meanings.definition: Rocks composed mainly of silt-sized particles.
meanings.sent1: Hikers marveled at the siltstones along the trail.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers encountered siltstones during excavation.
meanings.sent3: The siltstones seemed to whisper secrets of the earth's past.
meanings.sent4: The siltstones resembled a mosaic of earthy colors.
meanings.sent5: The siltstones crumbled easily under the pressure of the pickaxe.

meanings.definition: A type of rock made up of fine-grained particles.
meanings.sent1: The artist used siltstones to create a unique sculpture.
meanings.sent2: The garden pathway was lined with smooth siltstones.
meanings.sent3: The siltstones in the streambed played hide and seek with the fish.
meanings.sent4: The siltstones in the wall looked like a painting by nature.
meanings.sent5: The siltstones whispered tales of ancient lands to those who listened.
